header.title: Insurance Analytics
header.desc: Plotly graphs are used in the dashboards, reports, and software products of insurance companies worldwide.

quotes.author: - Goji, world's leading provider of automobile insurance
quotes.desc: Plotly is a breath of fresh air in a BI space has become bloated, noisy, frustrating, and inflexible. It embraces increasingly dominant open source data analysis tools such as IPython, and is embeddable wherever HTML is served.
